const response = await client.search({
  index: "shirts",
  query: {
    bool: {
      filter: [
        {
          term: {
            color: "red",
          },
        },
        {
          term: {
            brand: "gucci",
          },
        },
      ],
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    models: {
      terms: {
        field: "model",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
